affix.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: to fasten or stick something to something else
affix.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: A label must be affixed to all parcels.
affix.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: a group of letters added to the beginning or end of a word to change its meaning or use, such as ‘un-’, ‘mis-’, ‘-ness’, or ‘-ly’
